questions.questionText: Q1: What is your current educational background?
options: (A) Science (PCM)
(B) Science (PCB)
(C) Commerce
(D) Humanities/Arts
(E) Other (Vocational/Polytechnic)

questions.questionText: Q2: Have you decided on a career path?
options: (A) Yes, but I need course recommendations.
(B) No, I need help choosing a career.
questions.notes: If (A), we refine their course choices. If (B), we proceed with interest-based questions to suggest career-focused courses.

questions.questionText: Q3: What type of problems do you enjoy solving?
options: (A) Technical problems like coding & AI ➝ Computer Science, Data Science, Engineering
(B) Health & human body-related issues ➝ MBBS, Pharmacy, Biotechnology
(C) Financial, business, and market-related problems ➝ BBA, CA, Finance, Economics
(D) Social, political, and legal issues ➝ Law, Public Policy, Political Science
(E) Creative & artistic challenges ➝ Media, Design, Film Studies, Animation

questions.questionText: Q4: Which school subjects did you enjoy the most?
options: (A) Math & Physics ➝ Engineering, AI, Data Science, Economics
(B) Biology & Chemistry ➝ MBBS, Biotechnology, Psychology
(C) Business Studies & Economics ➝ BBA, Finance, Marketing, CA
(D) History & Political Science➝ Law, Journalism, Civil Services
(E) Art, Media, & Design ➝ Filmmaking, UI/UX, Fine Arts, Fashion Design

questions.questionText: Q5: If you had to work on a project for a year, what would it be?
options: (A) Developing a software application or AI tool ➝ CS, AI, Data Science, Engineering
(B) Researching cures for diseases or mental health issues ➝ MBBS, Biotech, Psychology
(C) Creating a business plan & analyzing financial trends ➝ BBA, CA, Finance, Economics
(D) Writing a book on political/economic trends ➝ Law, Political Science, Journalism
(E) Making a short film, painting, or designing a website ➝ Media, Fine Arts, UI/UX, Animation

questions.questionText: Q6: What type of work environment do you prefer?
options: (A) Tech-driven, innovation-focused➝ Tech Startups, AI, Software Engineering
(B) Hospitals, research labs, or mental health clinics ➝ Medicine, Biotech, Psychology
(C) Corporate offices, banks, or consulting firms ➝ Finance, CA, Business, Marketing
(D) Courts, government offices, or newsrooms ➝ Law, Public Policy, Journalism
(E) Studios, creative agencies, or self-employment ➝ Filmmaking, Design, Advertising

questions.questionText: Q7: How do you prefer to approach challenges?
options: (A) Using logic, coding, and mathematical models ➝ CS, AI, Engineering
(B) Conducting experiments, analyzing biological data ➝ Biotech, MBBS, Neuroscience
(C) Studying market trends, building financial strategies ➝ Commerce, Economics, CA
(D) Engaging in debates, writing research papers ➝ Law, Public Policy, Journalism
(E) Creating visual or storytelling-based content ➝ Design, Film, Advertising

questions.questionText: Q8: Which of these activities excites you the most?
options: (A) Coding and developing new tech solutions ➝ CS, AI, Data Science
(B) Understanding human behavior & medical advancements ➝ Psychology, MBBS, Biotech
(C) Stock market investments & business growth ➝ Finance, BBA, Economics
(D) Legal debates & writing reports on policy changes ➝ Law, Political Science
(E) Designing graphics, filming, or writing screenplays ➝ Media, UI/UX, Film Studies

questions.questionText: Q9: How do you prefer to work?
options: (A) Independently, solving logical problems ➝ Tech, AI, Research
(B) In a team, researching & experimenting ➝ Healthcare, Biotech, Medicine
(C) Leading business discussions, managing people ➝ Finance, Management, Entrepreneurship
(D) Writing, debating, and making an impact on society ➝ Law, Journalism, Public Policy
(E) Expressing creativity through visuals, design, or storytelling ➝ Arts, Filmmaking, UI/UX

questions.questionText: Q10: If you had unlimited resources, what would you study?
options: (A) Artificial Intelligence & Future Technologies ➝ CS, AI, Robotics
(B) Medical Sciences & Human Psychology ➝ MBBS, Psychology, Biotech
(C) Business, Finance & Global Economy ➝ BBA, Economics, CA, Investment Banking
(D) Law, Political Science & Governance ➝ Law, Public Administration, Civil Services
(E) Art, Film, Design & Media Studies ➝ Fine Arts, Fashion, Filmmaking
